#summary Installation tips for bdnews24 / joomla base.

= Installation =

There is no configuration.php file. Usually when trying to run without this Joomla will try to find the installation folder attempting to do fresh install. So, just copy configuration.php-dist to configuration.php, then edit the file and fill in the settings (like hostname, db user/password/name, physical folder structure, etc).

Create the following folders by hand. There are not added to source because the content of these folders are just temporary files that will vary from server to server:

www/cache
www/logs
www/tmp
